title: Wout van Aert, What Can’t He Do? Vuelta a España Sprint Points Leader Raids Spotted Mountain Jersey
content:
‘I was planning to have a rest day’: Van Aert adds polka dots to red and green Vuelta jersey collection, Kuss struggles in savage mountaintop showdown.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert, What Can’t He Do? Vuelta a España Sprint Points Leader Raids Spotted Mountain Jersey on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
